lead_paragraph: Newcastle United manager Steve McClaren said the club made a statement of intent to their fellow relegation strugglers by being the Premier League's biggest spenders in the January transfer window.

headline.print_headline: Newcastle's Transfer Spend a Statement of Intent-McClaren
headline.main: Newcastle's Transfer Spend a Statement of Intent-McClaren

snippet: Newcastle United manager Steve McClaren said the club made a statement of intent to their fellow relegation strugglers by being the Premier League's biggest spenders in the January transfer window....
